title: account hacks
body: my daughter's account was hacked and now we can't recover her account since the hacker changed the email attached to the name polarbearcub  which is her account name. we have the original email sent by riot to prove this is her account. we would like feed back on how we can retrieve polarbearcub back so my daughter can play again. we have spent some money into this account and would be greatly saddened if she would have to restart over with none of the things we have bought for her. I truly would like to be able to email riot directly to solve this matter.

replies.body:
No worries just yet! Reach out to our account specialists by sending us a ticket here -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Make sure to choose "I need help recovering my account" which will make you log out, and then send the ticket with all the relevant information. We'll be able to help out shortly ^_^!
